short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play Wordy - a version of Wordle Online Free! (Productivity and Fun)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Play Wordy - a version of Wordle ONLINE FREE! Not only can you play multiple times per day, but you can share your results, play with friends, and enter your unique ID to play the same word again!

Wordy is a fun interactive app where users get six chances to guess a randomly selected popular five-letter word.
